sentences.en: A human being has the vestige of a tail.
sentences.cn: 人类仍有尾巴退化的痕迹.

sentences.en: A vestige of the thoughts that once I had.
sentences.cn: 还留下我的思念的一点痕迹.

sentences.en: Every vestige has been swept away.
sentences.cn: 一切痕迹都被一扫而光.

sentences.en: It is said to need 200 thousand years to eliminate every human vestige.
sentences.cn: 据说需要20万年才能消除掉人类留下的痕迹.

sentences.en: It is the Epictetus who smiles when the last vestige of physical welfare is removed.
sentences.cn: 只有埃普克提图类型的主张忍耐与节制的人,才会在最后的一丝物质幸福的痕迹被抹掉的时候,能一笑置之.

sentences.en: It was intended to swallow every vestige of dwindling attractiveness out of her.
sentences.cn: 它的目的就是从她那里吸干她正在萎缩的残存的吸引力.

sentences.en: No vestige of Hat Island is left now.
sentences.cn: 帽儿岛现在已经无影无踪了.

sentences.en: Not a vestige of the abbey remains.
sentences.cn: 那修道院的遗迹已荡然无存.

sentences.en: Or is it just a harmless vestige of some ancient pagan ritual?
sentences.cn: 或者只是古代某些异教徒(举行宗教)仪式遗留下来的一种无害的风俗?

sentences.en: Rome attempted to erase the last vestige of Carthage.
sentences.cn: 罗马试图抹去迦太基最后的痕迹.

sentences.en: Some upright stones in wild places are the vestige of ancient religions.
sentences.cn: 荒原上一些直立的石块是古老宗教的遗迹.

sentences.en: Tell it quickly, nervously , and without a vestige of self - respect.
There had not a vestige of the abbey remains.
sentences.cn: 修道院的遗迹已荡然无存.

sentences.en: There is a vestige of truth in what he says.
sentences.cn: 你说的话有一定程度的真实性.

sentences.en: There's not a vestige of truth in his statement.
sentences.cn: 他的陈述毫无半点真实性.

sentences.en: We represent the last vestige of what made this nation great – hard work.
sentences.cn: 我们代表了曾经使这个国家伟大的仅存的品质–勤奋。

words.tran_cn: 退化的；残余的；发育不全的

trans.tran_cn: 遗迹，退化的器官，残余部分，毫不
trans.tran_en: a small part or amount of something that remains when most of it no longer exists
